TopicTitle: ADFX-02 Morgan from Ace Combat Zero

Articles.Content:
Sorry, I don\'t exactly know how to put cannons that would be able to fire AFTER launch, so this is unarmed, and I can\'t find any forward swept wings either.

You need C7, C7 'Beta' and NovaPunch (I forgot which one it was from)
To keep it stable (Because according to some flight sims that let your model your own aircraft) this design is actually very impractical and unstable and to get the length of some parts right.

If you\'re thinking of X-plane, last I looked the one who made this in there found it was quite flyable. Granted I don\'t know how much artificial stability was used, but if nothing else: putting the CG forward always increases stability. So to stabilise any design, all you have to do is justify a really awkward centre of gravity.
